summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, dated November 24, 2021, transmitting a redacted attorney narrative document related to a victim compensation program claim submission for the Epstein case.
keyFacts: The document is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The email transmits a redacted attorney narrative related to a victim compensation program claim submission for the Epstein case.
The email was sent on November 24, 2021.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal and administrative activity related to victim compensation in the Epstein case as of late 2021.
